SearchEquipmentCurrentInfomation.MainSQL: SELECT EQP.EQUIPMENT_ID , EQP.WO_DETL_ID , TSFD.DEMAND_TYPE , EQP.EQPT_OPER_MODE , EQP.SPCL_LOT_GNRT_FLAG , TECI.BUSINESS_USAGE_CODE_ID -- , PILOT_PROD_DIVS_CODE AS PPDC -- TODO 변수 없음 확인 필요 FROM TB_SFC_FP_DETL_PLAN TSFD INNER JOIN TB_EGN_EQUIP_INFO EQP ON EQP.WO_DETL_ID = TSFD.WOID INNER JOIN TB_EGN_CODE_ITEM_INFO TECI ON TECI.ATTRIBUTE1 = TSFD.DEMAND_TYPE
